metadata.description: Premium marketplace for revolutionary autonomous AI agents featuring four-tier architecture, intelligent pattern learning, comprehensive quality control, and full-stack validation with 80-90% auto-fix success rates.

plugins.name: autonomous-agent
plugins.description: Revolutionary four-tier agent architecture with 35 specialized agents, 24 skills, and 40 commands focused on autonomous development, code quality, and validation. v7.17.1: Version consistency fixes across all files. v7.17.0: Strategic refocus on core excellence - research functionality removed to eliminate high token costs. Features pattern learning, quality control, full-stack validation, intelligent automation, and 80-90% auto-fix success. Production ready with 60-70% token cost reduction and fully autonomous operation.
